segment.source: If you've provided packages targeting different operating systems, you have the option to customize parts of your description for different targeted operating systems.
segment.target: If you've provided packages targeting different operating systems, you have the option to customize parts of your description for different targeted operating systems.

segment.source: Create platform-specific descriptions
segment.target: Create platform-specific descriptions

segment.source: Create platform-specific descriptions
segment.target: Create platform-specific descriptions

segment.source: If you've provided packages targeting different operating systems, you have the option to customize parts of your description for different targeted operating systems.
segment.target: If you've provided packages targeting different operating systems, you have the option to customize parts of your description for different targeted operating systems.

segment.source: Note Customers on Windows 10 will always see your default description.
segment.target: Note Customers on Windows 10 will always see your default description.

segment.source: This is useful if you want to mention features that appear only in one OS version, or want to provide screenshots that are specific to a particular OS (independent of device type), rather than having all customers see the same description.
segment.target: This is useful if you want to mention features that appear only in one OS version, or want to provide screenshots that are specific to a particular OS (independent of device type), rather than having all customers see the same description.

segment.source: Note Creating a platform-specific description in one language does not create a platform-specific description in other languages that your app supports, even if you have entered description info for those languages.
segment.target: Note Creating a platform-specific description in one language does not create a platform-specific description in other languages that your app supports, even if you have entered description info for those languages.

segment.source: You'll need to create the platform-specific description separately for each language.
segment.target: You'll need to create the platform-specific description separately for each language.

segment.source: Creating a platform-specific description
segment.target: Creating a platform-specific description

segment.source: Near the top of your Description page, you'll see a link to create a platform-specific app description.
segment.target: Near the top of your Description page, you'll see a link to create a platform-specific app description.

segment.source: When you click this link, a popup will appear asking you to choose from your supported targeted operating systems.
segment.target: When you click this link, a popup will appear asking you to choose from your supported targeted operating systems.

segment.source: Windows 10 is not included in the list of choices, because customers on Windows 10 will always see the app's default description.
segment.target: Windows 10 is not included in the list of choices, because customers on Windows 10 will always see the app's default description.

segment.source: Note If you haven't provided packages targeting multiple OS versions, or if you've already created platform-specific descriptions for all of the OS versions your app targets, you won't be able to make a selection.
segment.target: Note If you haven't provided packages targeting multiple OS versions, or if you've already created platform-specific descriptions for all of the OS versions your app targets, you won't be able to make a selection.

segment.source: You can choose to use your default description as a starting point, which will bring over all of the text and images you've entered for your default description; you'll then be able to make any changes you'd like before saving.
segment.target: You can choose to use your default description as a starting point, which will bring over all of the text and images you've entered for your default description; you'll then be able to make any changes you'd like before saving.

segment.source: You can also start from a completely blank description if you prefer.
segment.target: You can also start from a completely blank description if you prefer.

segment.source: After you click Continue, your Description page will now include a section for the platform-specific description you've just created (underneath the Default description section).
segment.target: After you click Continue, your Description page will now include a section for the platform-specific description you've just created (underneath the Default description section).

segment.source: This section will include its own set of fields for Description (required), Release notes, Screenshots, App tile icon, App features, and Recommended hardware.
segment.target: This section will include its own set of fields for Description (required), Release notes, Screenshots, App tile icon, App features, and Recommended hardware.

segment.source: Make sure to enter info into each field where you want to display info in the custom description, even if it's the same info as in your default description.
segment.target: Make sure to enter info into each field where you want to display info in the custom description, even if it's the same info as in your default description.

segment.source: If you leave any of these fields blank, no info will appear for that field in the custom description.
segment.target: If you leave any of these fields blank, no info will appear for that field in the custom description.

segment.source: Note Not all fields of your app's description can be customized for a specific targeted OS.
segment.target: Note Not all fields of your app's description can be customized for a specific targeted OS.

segment.source: For more info, see Shared fields.
segment.target: For more info, see Shared fields.

segment.source: Removing a platform-specific description
segment.target: Removing a platform-specific description

segment.source: If you create a platform-specific description and later decide you'd rather show your default description to customers on that operating system, click the Delete link.
segment.target: If you create a platform-specific description and later decide you'd rather show your default description to customers on that operating system, click the Delete link.

segment.source: After confirming that you'd like to show those customers your default description, click OK.
segment.target: After confirming that you'd like to show those customers your default description, click OK.

segment.source: The platform-specific description will be removed.
segment.target: The platform-specific description will be removed.

segment.source: If you decide you want it back later, you can always create a new platform-specific description for that operating system by following the steps listed above.
segment.target: If you decide you want it back later, you can always create a new platform-specific description for that operating system by following the steps listed above.
